mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cs_task (taskId,order_asset_Id,execute_time,status,group_flag,remarks, engineIP,taskProgress,currentUrl,begin_time,end_time,scanTime, issueCount,requestCount,urlCount,averResponse, averSendCount,sendBytes,receiveBytes,websoc) VALUES(#{taskId}, #{order_asset_Id} , #{execute_time},#{status},#{group_flag}, #{remarks},#{engineIP},#{taskProgress},#{currentUrl},#{begin_time},#{end_time},#{scanTime}, #{issueCount},#{requestCount},#{urlCount},#{averResponse},#{averSendCount},#{sendBytes},#{receiveBytes},#{websoc}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=#{status}, engineIP=#{engineIP}, taskProgress=#{taskProgress}, currentUrl=#{currentUrl}, execute_time=#{execute_time}, group_flag=#{group_flag}, begin_time=#{begin_time}, end_time=#{end_time}, scanTime=#{scanTime}, issueCount=#{issueCount}, requestCount=#{requestCount}, urlCount=#{urlCount}, averResponse=#{averResponse}, averSendCount=#{averSendCount}, sendBytes=#{sendBytes}, receiveBytes=#{receiveBytes}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,COUNT(a.id) FROM (SELECT o.id ,t.taskId FROM cs_order o, cs_order_asset oa, cs_task t WHERE o.id={id} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id)a GROUP BY a.id HAVING a.id={id}
SELECT COUNT(a.t1) from (SELECT o.userId o1,t.taskId t1 FROM cs_order o, cs_order_asset oa, cs_task t WHERE oa.id=t.order_asset_Id and oa.orderId=o.id AND o.userId=#{userId})a

SELECT MIN(t.execute_time) AS execute_time,MAX(t.end_time) AS end_time,AVG(t.scanTime) AS scanTime,AVG(t.issueCount) AS issueCount,AVG(t.requestCount) AS requestCount,AVG(t.urlCount) AS urlCount,AVG(t.averResponse) AS averResponse,AVG(t.averSendCount) AS averSendCount,AVG(t.sendBytes) AS sendBytes,AVG(t.receiveBytes) AS receiveBytes FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.group_flag=#{group_flag} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC
SELECT * FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} ORDER BY t.execute_time DESC limit 1
select count(*) FROM cs_order_asset oa WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId}

SELECT t.group_flag,t.alarm_view_flag,sum(t.issueCount) sum_issue_count FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status = 3 GROUP BY t.group_flag,t.alarm_view_flag ORDER BY t.execute_time
select * from cs_task where taskId in (select t.taskId id from cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id=oa.id and oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status=3 and t.isAlarm=1 )
select * from cs_task t where t.status ! = 3
SELECT t.* FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND t.status = 2 ORDER BY t.execute_time
mapper.update:
update cs_task
begin_time=#{begin_time},
end_time=#{end_time},
scanTime=#{scanTime},
engineIP=#{engineIP},
taskProgress=#{taskProgress},
currentUrl=#{currentUrl},
issueCount=#{issueCount},
requestCount=#{requestCount},
urlCount=#{urlCount},
averResponse=#{averResponse},
averSendCount=#{averSendCount},
sendBytes=#{sendBytes},
receiveBytes=#{receiveBytes},
isAlarm=#{isAlarm}
where taskId = #{taskId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.taskId from cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa,cs_alarm a WHERE t.order_asset_Id=oa.id and t.taskId = a.taskId and oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status=3 and t.isAlarm=1
